Airport '79","overview":"Aviation disaster-prone Joe Patroni must contend with nuclear missiles, the French Air Force and the threat of the plane splitting in two over the Alps.","poster_path":"/bsKUgMi01dme7IDdEWRJSMBNj6R.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[28,18,53],"popularity":17.867,"release_date":"1979-08-17","video":false,"vote_average":4.7,"vote_count":175},{"backdrop_path":"/83YI8dTK3t02c0kyY3SLWu1mSpx.jpg","id":27932,"title":"Airport 1975","original_title":"Airport 1975","overview":"When an in-flight collision incapacitates the pilots of an airplane bound for Los Angeles, stewardess Nancy Pryor is forced to take over the controls. From the ground, her boyfriend Alan Murdock, a retired test pilot, tries to talk her through piloting and landing the 747 aircraft. Worse yet, the anxious passengers — among which are a noisy nun and a cranky man — are aggravating the already tense atmosphere.","poster_path":"/etfUuwVCvywq8mGspT94CBeLpSz.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[18,53,28],"popularity":25.694,"release_date":"1974-10-18","video":false,"vote_average":5.671,"vote_count":248},{"backdrop_path":"/8V11i15WdTszH3xqYQgDpcYcyYC.jpg","id":55006,"title":"The 7th Dimension","original_title":"The 7th Dimension","overview":"Two young women arrive at a curious penthouse apartment, led by one's crush on her tutor. However, her love interest doesn't live alone. He's part of a trio of computer hackers about to embark on the ultimate job on the world's most mysterious mainframe. Whilst doing so, they unlock more than they bargain for with supernatural and ultimately fatal results. Can this seemingly insignificant chain of events, which have thrown this group together, be construed as fate? Can the beacon provide a signal of hope or is it a web of manipulation, paranoia and ultimately... murder?","poster_path":"/vjEF5cz5TuSYIs3pkMLdF46RTYh.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[878,53,27],"popularity":4.572,"release_date":"2010-07-12","video":false,"vote_average":4.75,"vote_count":33},{"backdrop_path":"/xNoOkvNrl8EnHxkX6uNfXkBreg2.jpg","id":216788,"title":"A Street in Palermo","original_title":"Via Castellana Bandiera","overview":"Shut inside their cars, two women face off in a silent duel that is fought out in the intimate violence of their stares. A wholly female duel punctuated by the refusal to drink, eat and sleep; more obstinate than the sun of Palermo and more stubborn than the ferocity of the men who surround them. For, as in every duel, it is a question of life or death... It’s a Sunday afternoon. The sirocco is blowing pitilessly in Palermo when Rosa and Clara lose their way in the streets of the city and end up in a sort of alley: Via Castellana Bandiera. At the same moment, another car driven by Samira, crammed with members of the Calafiore family, arrives from the opposite direction and enters the same street.","poster_path":"/1mEcUbsjIU304rPfHT97lgcq4eU.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"it","genre_ids":[18,35],"popularity":5.989,"release_date":"2013-09-19","video":false,"vote_average":6.2,"vote_count":32},{"backdrop_path":"/xYIkbNLw2Kym2ndzpnqKZJjqMFS.jpg","id":31638,"title":"Beyond the Poseidon Adventure","original_title":"Beyond the Poseidon Adventure","overview":"After \"The Poseidon Adventure\", in which the ship got flipped over by a tidal wave, the ship drifts bottom-up in the sea. James Ferraday (Rock Hudson), is dispatched to save them.","poster_path":"/euPqp2J79zAomdgCcdpCmqjRHMy.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[28,12,53],"popularity":19.693,"release_date":"1968-10-23","video":false,"vote_average":6.2,"vote_count":157},{"backdrop_path":"/pkL5Irj4WYU27jziUSgwl1d7d0D.jpg","id":34314,"title":"Turbulence","original_title":"Turbulence","overview":"On a flight transporting dangerous convicts, murderer Ryan Weaver manages to break free and cause complete chaos throughout the plane. Barcelona, 1977. Manuel, a young accountant, imprisoned and awaiting trial for embezzlement, faces a sentence of 6 to 8 years, a disproportionate punishment for the crime committed. Together with his cellmate Pino, he joins forces with COPEL, a collective fighting for the rights of ordinary prisoners and amnesty. A war for freedom breaks out that will bring the Spanish prison system to its knees. If things are changing outside, they’ll have to do the same inside. A tale of friendship, solidarity and freedom, inspired in true events.","poster_path":"/8NmaPNP3NS0Ok6sL1fT6ZSnw5OF.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"es","genre_ids":[18],"popularity":14.508,"release_date":"2022-09-23","video":false,"vote_average":7.115,"vote_count":144},{"backdrop_path":"/4hRQylOUK1pUMtvalpJJsnxZffy.jpg","id":11841,"title":"The 36th Chamber of Shaolin","original_title":"少林三十六房","overview":"The anti-Ching patriots, under the guidance of Ho Kuang-han, have secretly set up their base in Canton, disguised as school masters.
